I still have right to choose. BTW, what defines "conservative" varies.
For instance, I would never ever upload gay movies, porn or violence toward animals.

Plenty of other uploaders are specialized for that. Not me.
I do like provocative shows - but that is (as many other things) things that each person should treat as - personal and not fed public who is not interested (0.4% of gay population should stop to force-feed the majority, each his own).

FYI, there are dozens of better shows, which I have no interest about - much better than Lip Service. By miles better...

RE: Lip Service.
I...have never seen it--just read about it researching what Laura Fraser (who played the female blacksmith in A Knight's Tale) was doing lately--and it looked interesting, if a bit provocative.  Just didn't want to waste 550 MB of download time--and disk space--for less than an hour's worth of viewing time (the "standard" 350 MB for non-20-40 TV shows is bad enough!).
And, I trust 20-40's judgement on this, as with most.

@abciscrazy
You've been here long enough to KNOW that twentyforty doesn't encode SHIT--specifically, very few TSs/Screeners/Cams make the cut.  For that reason, even though I actually have downloaded it, I am not going to dignify your question with a direct answer.

@abciscrazy: Azrielle is right, and - I would NEVER lie about the source.. Download other "R5" or "DVDrips" of RedRiding and you'll see what I mean. However, video source DVD (shitty probably some wild copy for Iraqi market) and audio source is shitty line - it CANNOT be called R5 (as others did) because East European DVD is PAL 25 fps and NOT 29.97 fps as they are. Besides - it's 284 MB - keep that in mind - but I doubt you can, you've been rabid few times before.
